SCTX:
Begin ringAzuraScript

;makes ring spin around like a cheesy B movie until you click on it

short doOnce

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( CellChanged == 1 )
	Disable
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	Rotate Z 30
	return
endif

Cast "hand of azura" Player
Set doOnce to 1
Activate

End
